  this.show = function() {
    return "this is a object function";
  };
}

  return "this is a User function";
};
const dd = new User();
console.dir(dd.show()); //this is a object function
console.dir(User.show()); //this is a User function

åœ¨ class å†…å£°æ˜çš„æ–¹æ³•å‰ä½¿ç”¨ static å®šä¹‰çš„æ–¹æ³•å³æ˜¯é™æ€æ–¹æ³•ã€‚é€šè¿‡ç±»è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯é™æ€æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ç±»çš„å®ä¾‹è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯æˆå‘˜æ–¹æ³•

ä¸‹é¢ä½¿ç”¨é™æ€æ–¹æ³•åœ¨è¯¾ç¨‹ç±»ä¸­çš„ä½¿ç”¨

js
const data = [
  { name: "js", price: 100 },
  { name: "mysql", price: 212 },
  { name: "vue.js", price: 98 }
];
class Lesson {
  constructor(data) {
    this.model = data;
  }
  get price() {
    return this.model.price;
  }
  get name() {
    return this.model.name;
  }
  //æ‰¹é‡ç”Ÿæˆå¯¹è±¡
  static createBatch(data) {
    return data.map(item => new Lesson(item));
  }
  //æœ€è´µçš„è¯¾ç¨‹
  static MaxPrice(collection) {
    return collection.sort((a, b) => b.price() - a.price())[0];
  }
}
const lessons = Lesson.createBatch(data);
console.log(lessons);
console.log(Lesson.MaxPrice(lessons).name);
const data = [
  { name: "js", price: 100 },
  { name: "mysql", price: 212 },
  { name: "vue.js", price: 98 }
];
class Lesson {
  constructor(data) {
    this.model = data;
  }
  get price() {
    return this.model.price;
  }
  get name() {
    return this.model.name;
  }
  //æ‰¹é‡ç”Ÿæˆå¯¹è±¡
  static createBatch(data) {
    return data.map(item => new Lesson(item));
  }
  //æœ€è´µçš„è¯¾ç¨‹
  static MaxPrice(collection) {
    return collection.sort((a, b) => b.price() - a.price())[0];
  }
}
const lessons = Lesson.createBatch(data);
console.log(lessons);
console.log(Lesson.MaxPrice(lessons).name);

è¯­æ³•ä»‹ç» â€‹

  • ä½¿ç”¨è®¿é—®å™¨å¯ä»¥ç®¡æ§å±æ€§ï¼Œæœ‰æ•ˆçš„é˜²æ­¢å±æ€§éšæ„ä¿®æ”¹
  • è®¿é—®å™¨å°±æ˜¯åœ¨å‡½æ•°å‰åŠ ä¸Š get/setä¿®é¥°ï¼Œæ“ä½œå±æ€§æ—¶ä¸éœ€è¦åŠ å‡½æ•°çš„æ‰©å·ï¼Œç›´æ¥ç”¨å‡½æ•°å
js
class User {
  constructor(name) {
    this.data = { name };
  }
  get name() {
    return this.data.name;
  }
  set name(value) {
    if (value.trim() == "") throw new Error("invalid params");
    this.data.name = value;
  }
}
let hd = new User("åˆ€åˆ€");
hd.name = "daodao";
console.log(hd.name);

protected â€‹

protectedæ˜¯å—ä¿æŠ¤çš„å±æ€§ä¿®é‡Šï¼Œä¸å…è®¸å¤–éƒ¨ç›´æ¥æ“ä½œï¼Œä½†å¯ä»¥ç»§æ‰¿ååœ¨ç±»å†…éƒ¨è®¿é—®ï¼Œæœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹å‡ ç§æ–¹å¼å®šä¹‰

å‘½åä¿æŠ¤ â€‹

å°†å±æ€§å®šä¹‰ä¸ºä»¥ _ å¼€å§‹ï¼Œæ¥å‘Šè¯‰ä½¿ç”¨è€…è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç§æœ‰å±æ€§ï¼Œè¯·ä¸è¦åœ¨å¤–éƒ¨ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

  • å¤–éƒ¨ä¿®æ”¹ç§æœ‰å±æ€§æ—¶å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨è®¿é—®å™¨ setter æ“ä½œ
  • ä½†è¿™åªæ˜¯æç¤ºï¼Œå°±åƒå¸çƒŸæ—¶çƒŸç›’ä¸Šçš„å¸çƒŸæœ‰å®³å¥åº·ï¼Œä½†è¿˜æ˜¯å¯ä»¥æŠ½çš„
js
class Article {
  _host = "https://daodao.com";

  set host(url) {
    if (!/^https:\/\//i.test(url)) {
      throw new Error("ç½‘å€é”™è¯¯");
    }
    this._host = url;
  }
  
  lists() {
    return `${this._host}/article`;
  }
}
let article = new Article();
console.log(article.lists()); //https://daodao.com/article
article.host = "https://duyidao.com";
console.log(article.lists()); //https://duyidao.com/article
class Article {
  _host = "https://daodao.com";

  set host(url) {
    if (!/^https:\/\//i.test(url)) {
      throw new Error("ç½‘å€é”™è¯¯");
    }
    this._host = url;
  }
  
  lists() {
    return `${this._host}/article`;
  }
}
let article = new Article();
console.log(article.lists()); //https://daodao.com/article
article.host = "https://duyidao.com";
console.log(article.lists()); //https://duyidao.com/article

ç»§æ‰¿æ—¶æ˜¯å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨çš„

js
class Common {
  _host = "https://daodao.com";
  set host(url) {
    if (!/^https:\/\//i.test(url)) {
      throw new Error("ç½‘å€é”™è¯¯");
    }
    this._host = url;
  }
}
class Article extends Common {
  lists() {
    return `${this._host}/article`;
  }
}
let article = new Article();
console.log(article.lists()); //https://daodao.com/article
article.host = "https://duyidao.com";
console.log(article.lists()); //https://duyidao.com/article
class Common {
  _host = "https://daodao.com";
  set host(url) {
    if (!/^https:\/\//i.test(url)) {
      throw new Error("ç½‘å€é”™è¯¯");
    }
    this._host = url;
  }
}
class Article extends Common {
  lists() {
    return `${this._host}/article`;
  }
}
let article = new Article();
console.log(article.lists()); //https://daodao.com/article
article.host = "https://duyidao.com";
console.log(article.lists()); //https://duyidao.com/article

Symbol â€‹

ä¸‹é¢ä½¿ç”¨ Symbolå®šä¹‰ç§æœ‰è®¿é—®å±æ€§ï¼Œå³åœ¨å¤–éƒ¨é€šè¿‡æŸ¥çœ‹å¯¹è±¡ç»“æ„æ— æ³•è·å–çš„å±æ€§

js
const protecteds = Symbol();
class Common {
  constructor() {
    this[protecteds] = {};
    this[protecteds].host = "https://houdunren.com";
  }
  set host(url) {
    if (!/^https?:/i.test(url)) {
      throw new Error("éå¸¸ç½‘å€");
    }
    this[protecteds].host = url;
  }
  get host() {
    return this[protecteds].host;
  }
}
class User extends Common {
  constructor(name) {
    super();
    this[protecteds].name = name;
  }
  get name() {
    return this[protecteds].name;
  }
}
let hd = new User("daodao");
hd.host = "https://www.hdcms.com";
// console.log(hd[Symbol()]);
console.log(hd.name);
const protecteds = Symbol();
class Common {
  constructor() {
    this[protecteds] = {};
    this[protecteds].host = "https://houdunren.com";
  }
  set host(url) {
    if (!/^https?:/i.test(url)) {
      throw new Error("éå¸¸ç½‘å€");
    }
    this[protecteds].host = url;
  }
  get host() {
    return this[protecteds].host;
  }
}
class User extends Common {
  constructor(name) {
    super();
    this[protecteds].name = name;
  }
  get name() {
    return this[protecteds].name;
  }
}
let hd = new User("daodao");
hd.host = "https://www.hdcms.com";
// console.log(hd[Symbol()]);
console.log(hd.name);

WeakMap â€‹

WeakMap æ˜¯ä¸€ç»„é”®/å€¼å¯¹çš„é›†ï¼Œä¸‹é¢åˆ©ç”¨WeakMapç±»å‹ç‰¹æ€§å®šä¹‰ç§æœ‰å±æ€§

js
const _host = new WeakMap();
class Common {
  constructor() {
    _host.set(this, "https://houdunren.com");
  }
  set host(url) {
    if (!/^https:\/\//i.test(url)) {
      throw new Error("ç½‘å€é”™è¯¯");
    }
    _host.set(this, url);
  }
}
class Article extends Common {
  constructor() {
    super();
  }
  lists() {
    return `${_host.get(this)}/article`;
  }
}
let article = new Article();
console.log(article.lists()); //https://houdunren.com/article
article.host = "https://hdcms.com";
console.log(article.lists()); //https://hdcms.com/article

    if (!/^https:\/\//i.test(url)) {
      throw new Error("ç½‘å€é”™è¯¯");
    }
    _host.set(this, url);
  }
}

  constructor() {
    super();
  }
  lists() {
    return `${_host.get(this)}/article`;

ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç»Ÿä¸€å®šä¹‰ç§æœ‰å±æ€§

js
const protecteds = new WeakMap();
class Common {
  constructor() {
    protecteds.set(this, {
      host: "https://houdunren.com",
      port: "80"
    });
  }
  set host(url) {
    if (!/^https:\/\//i.test(url)) {
      throw new Error("ç½‘å€é”™è¯¯");
    }
    protecteds.set(this, { ...protecteds.get(this), host: url });
  }
}
class Article extends Common {
  constructor() {
    super();
  }
  lists() {
    return `${protecteds.get(this).host}/article`;
  }
}
let article = new Article();
console.log(article.lists()); //https://houdunren.com/article
article.host = "https://hdcms.com";
console.log(article.lists()); //https://hdcms.com/article
const protecteds = new WeakMap();
class Common {
  constructor() {
    protecteds.set(this, {
      host: "https://houdunren.com",
      port: "80"
    });
  }
  set host(url) {
    if (!/^https:\/\//i.test(url)) {
      throw new Error("ç½‘å€é”™è¯¯");
    }
    protecteds.set(this, { ...protecteds.get(this), host: url });
  }
}
class Article extends Common {
  constructor() {
    super();
  }
  lists() {
    return `${protecteds.get(this).host}/article`;
  }
}
let article = new Article();
console.log(article.lists()); //https://houdunren.com/article
article.host = "https://hdcms.com";
console.log(article.lists()); //https://hdcms.com/article

private â€‹

private æŒ‡ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ï¼Œåªåœ¨å½“å‰ç±»å¯ä»¥è®¿é—®åˆ°ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä¸å…è®¸ç»§æ‰¿ä½¿ç”¨

  • ä¸ºå±æ€§æˆ–æ–¹æ³•åå‰åŠ  # ä¸ºå£°æ˜ä¸ºç§æœ‰å±æ€§

ä¸‹é¢å£°æ˜ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ #host ä¸ç§æœ‰æ–¹æ³• check ç”¨äºæ£€æµ‹ç”¨æˆ·å

js
class User {
  //private
  #host = "https://houdunren.com";
  constructor(name) {
    this.name = name ;
    this.#check(name);
  }
  set host(url) {
    if (!/^https?:/i.test(url)) {
      throw new Error("éå¸¸ç½‘å€");
    }
    this.#host = url;
  }
  get host() {
    return this.#host;
  }
  #check = () => {
    if (this.name.length <= 5) {
      throw new Error("ç”¨æˆ·åé•¿åº¦ä¸èƒ½å°äºäº”ä½");
    }
    return true;
  };
}
let hd = new User("åç›¾äººåœ¨çº¿æ•™ç¨‹");
hd.host = "https://www.hdcms.com";
console.log(hd.host);

js
const protecteds = Symbol("protected");
class User {
  constructor(name) {
    this[protecteds] = { name };
  }
  get name() {
    return this[protecteds].name;
  }
  set name(value) {
    if (value.trim() == "") throw new Error("invalid params");
    this[protecteds].name = value;
  }
}
let hd = new User("åˆ€åˆ€");
hd.name = "daodao";
console.log(hd.name);
console.log(Object.keys(hd));

  constructor(name) {
    this.name = name;
  }
  show() {
    return `åç›¾äººä¼šå‘˜: ${this.name}`;
  }

  }

    return super.show();
  }
}

è¡¨ç¤ºä»å½“å‰åŸå‹ä¸­æ‰§è¡Œæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œ

  name: "user",

    return this.name;
  }

    return this.__proto__.show();
  }
};

constructor ä¸­å…ˆè°ƒç”¨ super æ–¹æ³•çš„åŸç†å¦‚ä¸‹

function Parent(name) {
  this.name = name;
}
function User(...args) {
  Parent.apply(this, args);
}
User.prototype = Object.create(User.prototype)
User.prototype.constructor = User;
const hd = new User("daodao");
console.log(hd.name);
function Parent(name) {
  this.name = name;
}
function User(...args) {
  Parent.apply(this, args);
}
User.prototype = Object.create(User.prototype)
User.prototype.constructor = User;
const hd = new User("daodao");
console.log(hd.name);

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯é€šè¿‡çˆ¶ç±»æ–¹æ³•è·å–è¯¾ç¨‹æ€»ä»·

js
class Controller {
  sum() {
    return this.data.reduce((t, c) => t + c.price, 0);
  }
} 
class Lesson extends Controller {
  constructor(lessons) {
    super();
    this.data = lessons;
  }
  info() {
    return {
      totalPrice: super.sum(),
      data: this.data
    };
  }
}
let data = [
  { name: "js", price: 100 },
  { name: "mysql", price: 212 },
  { name: "vue.js", price: 98 }
];
const hd = new Lesson(data);
console.log(hd.info());
class Controller {
  sum() {
    return this.data.reduce((t, c) => t + c.price, 0);
  }
} 
class Lesson extends Controller {
  constructor(lessons) {
    super();
    this.data = lessons;
  }
  info() {
    return {
      totalPrice: super.sum(),
      data: this.data
    };
  }
}
let data = [
  { name: "js", price: 100 },
  { name: "mysql", price: 212 },
  { name: "vue.js", price: 98 }
];
const hd = new Lesson(data);
console.log(hd.info());

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯è¦†ç›–çˆ¶ç±»æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œåªè·å–è¯¾ç¨‹åç§°

js
class Controller {
  say() {
    return this.name;
  }
  total() {
    return this.data.reduce((t, c) => t + c.price, 0);
  }
  getByKey(key) {
    return this.data.filter(item => item.name.includes(key));
  }
}
class Lesson extends Controller {
  constructor(lessons) {
    super();
    this.data = lessons;
  }
  getByKey(key) {
    return super.getByKey(key).map(item => item.name);
  }
}
let data = [
  { name: "js", price: 100 },
  { name: "mysql", price: 212 },
  { name: "vue.js", price: 98 }
];
const hd = new Lesson(data);
console.log(hd.getByKey("js"));
class Controller {
  say() {
    return this.name;
  }
  total() {
    return this.data.reduce((t, c) => t + c.price, 0);
  }
  getByKey(key) {
    return this.data.filter(item => item.name.includes(key));
  }
}
class Lesson extends Controller {
  constructor(lessons) {
    super();
    this.data = lessons;
  }
  getByKey(key) {
    return super.getByKey(key).map(item => item.name);
  }
}
let data = [
  { name: "js", price: 100 },
  { name: "mysql", price: 212 },
  { name: "vue.js", price: 98 }
];
const hd = new Lesson(data);
console.log(hd.getByKey("js"));

é™æ€ç»§æ‰¿ â€‹

é™æ€çš„å±æ€§å’Œæ–¹æ³•ä¹Ÿæ˜¯å¯ä»¥è¢«ç»§æ‰¿ä½¿ç”¨çš„ï¼Œä¸‹é¢æ˜¯åŸç†åˆ†æ

js
function User() {}
User.site = "daodao";
User.url = function() {
  return "daodao.com";
};
function Admin() {}
Admin.__proto__ = User;
console.dir(Admin); // 
console.log(Admin.url()); // daodao.com

  return "daodao.com";
};
function Admin() {}
Admin.__proto__ = User;

console.log(Admin.url()); // daodao.com

ä¸‹é¢ä½¿ç”¨ class æ¥æ¼”ç¤ºé™æ€ç»§æ‰¿

  static site = "daodao";
  static host() {
    return "daodao.com";
  }

class Admin extends User {}
console.dir(Admin);
class User {
  static site = "daodao";
  static host() {
    return "daodao.com";
  }
}
class Admin extends User {}
console.dir(Admin);

å¯¹è±¡æ£€æµ‹ â€‹

instanceof â€‹

ä½¿ç”¨ instanceof ç”¨äºæ£€æµ‹ï¼Œä¸‹é¢æ˜¯åœ¨åŸå‹ä¸­çš„åˆ†æï¼ˆå·²ç»åœ¨åŸå‹ä¸ç»§æ‰¿ä¸­è®²è¿‡ï¼‰

js
function User() {}
function Admin() {}
Admin.prototype = Object.create(User.prototype);
let hd = new Admin();
console.log(hd instanceof Admin); //true
console.log(hd instanceof User); //true

console.log(hd.__proto__ == Admin.prototype);
console.log(hd.__proto__.__proto__ == User.prototype);
function User() {}
function Admin() {}
Admin.prototype = Object.create(User.prototype);
let hd = new Admin();
console.log(hd instanceof Admin); //true
console.log(hd instanceof User); //true

console.log(hd.__proto__ == Admin.prototype);
console.log(hd.__proto__.__proto__ == User.prototype);

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯é€’å½’æ£€æµ‹åŸå‹çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œå¸®åŠ©ä½ åˆ†æ instanceof çš„åŸç†

js
function checkPrototype(obj, constructor) {
  if (!obj.__proto__) return false;
  if (obj.__proto__ == constructor.prototype) return true;
  return checkPrototype(obj.__proto__, constructor);
}
function checkPrototype(obj, constructor) {
  if (!obj.__proto__) return false;
  if (obj.__proto__ == constructor.prototype) return true;
  return checkPrototype(obj.__proto__, constructor);
}

class å†…éƒ¨å®ç°å°±æ˜¯åŸºäºåŸå‹ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨instanceof åˆ¤æ–­å’Œä¸Šé¢åŸå‹æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„

js
class User {}
class Admin extends User {}
let hd = new Admin();
console.log(hd instanceof Admin);
console.log(hd instanceof User);
class User {}
class Admin extends User {}
let hd = new Admin();
console.log(hd instanceof Admin);
console.log(hd instanceof User);

isPrototypeOf â€‹

ä½¿ç”¨ isPrototypeOf åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦åœ¨å¦ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„åŸå‹é“¾ä¸­ï¼Œä¸‹é¢æ˜¯åŸç†åˆ†æ

js
const a = {};
const b = {
  __proto__: a
};
const c = {
  __proto__: b
};
console.log(a.isPrototypeOf(b)); //true
console.log(a.isPrototypeOf(c)); //true
console.log(c.isPrototypeOf(b)); //false
const a = {};
const b = {
  __proto__: a
};
const c = {
  __proto__: b
};
console.log(a.isPrototypeOf(b)); //true
console.log(a.isPrototypeOf(c)); //true
console.log(c.isPrototypeOf(b)); //false

ç»§æ‰¿å†…ç½®ç±» â€‹

ä½¿ç”¨åŸå‹æ‰©å±•å†…ç½®ç±»

js
function Arr(...args) {
  args.forEach(item => this.push(item)); // ç»§æ‰¿äº†æ•°ç»„çš„pushæ–¹æ³•
  this.first = function() {
    return this[0];
  };
  this.max = function() {
    return this.data.sort((a, b) => b - a)[0];
  };
}
let a = [1, 23];
Arr.prototype = Object.create(Array.prototype); // ç»§æ‰¿æ•°ç»„çš„æ–¹æ³•

let arr = new Arr("daodao", 2, 3);
console.log(arr.first());
function Arr(...args) {
  args.forEach(item => this.push(item)); // ç»§æ‰¿äº†æ•°ç»„çš„pushæ–¹æ³•
  this.first = function() {
    return this[0];
  };
  this.max = function() {
    return this.data.sort((a, b) => b - a)[0];
  };
}

ä½¿ç”¨ classæ‰©å±•å†…ç½®ç±»

js
class NewArr extends Array {
  constructor(...args) {
    super(...args);
  }
  first() {
    return this[0];
  }
  add(value) {
    this.push(value);
  }
  remove(value) {
    let pos = this.findIndex(curValue => {
      return curValue == value;
    });
    this.splice(pos, 1);
  }
}
let hd = new NewArr(5, 3, 2, 1);
console.log(hd.length); //4
console.log(hd.first()); //5

hd.add("houdunren");
console.log(hd.join(",")); //5,3,2,1,houdunren

hd.remove("3");
console.log(hd.join(",")); //5,2,1,houdunren
class NewArr extends Array {
  constructor(...args) {
    super(...args);
  }
  first() {
    return this[0];
  }
  add(value) {
    this.push(value);
  }
  remove(value) {
    let pos = this.findIndex(curValue => {
      return curValue == value;
    });
    this.splice(pos, 1);
  }
}
let hd = new NewArr(5, 3, 2, 1);
console.log(hd.length); //4
console.log(hd.first()); //5

hd.add("houdunren");
console.log(hd.join(",")); //5,3,2,1,houdunren

hd.remove("3");
console.log(hd.join(",")); //5,2,1,houdunren

mixin â€‹

å…³äºmixin çš„ä½¿ç”¨åœ¨åŸå‹ç« èŠ‚å·²ç»è®¨è®ºè¿‡ï¼Œåœ¨class ä½¿ç”¨ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ç›¸åŒçš„åŸç†

JSä¸èƒ½å®ç°å¤šç»§æ‰¿ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¦ä½¿ç”¨å¤šä¸ªç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•æ—¶å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨mixinæ··åˆæ¨¡å¼æ¥å®Œæˆã€‚

  • mixin ç±»æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…å«è®¸å¤šä¾›å…¶å®ƒç±»ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•çš„ç±»
  • mixin ç±»ä¸ç”¨æ¥ç»§æ‰¿åšä¸ºå…¶å®ƒç±»çš„çˆ¶ç±»

å…¶ä»–è¯­è¨€ä¹Ÿæœ‰ç±»ä¼¼çš„æ“ä½œæ¯”å¦‚php è¯­è¨€ä¸­å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ trait å®Œæˆç±»ä¼¼æ“ä½œ

js
const Tool = {
  max(key) {
    return this.data.sort((a, b) => b[key] - a[key])[0];
  }
};

class Lesson {
  constructor(lessons) {
    this.lessons = lessons;
  }
  get data() {
    return this.lessons;
  }
}

Object.assign(Lesson.prototype, Tool);
const data = [
  { name: "js", price: 100 },
  { name: "mysql", price: 212 },
  { name: "vue.js", price: 98 }
];
let hd = new Lesson(data);
console.log(hd.max("price"));
const Tool = {
  max(key) {
    return this.data.sort((a, b) => b[key] - a[key])[0];
  }
};

class Lesson {
  constructor(lessons) {
    this.lessons = lessons;
  }
  get data() {
    return this.lessons;
  }
}

Object.assign(Lesson.prototype, Tool);

  { name: "js", price: 100 },
  { name: "mysql", price: 212 },
  { name: "vue.js", price: 98 }
];

å®ä¾‹æ“ä½œ â€‹

html
<style>
  * {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    box-sizing: content-box;
  }
  body {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  .slide {
    width: 300px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); */
  }
  .slide dt {
    height: 30px;
    background: #34495e;
    color: white;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding-left: 10px;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  .slide dt:first-of-type {
    border-top-left-radius: 10px;
    border-top-right-radius: 10px;
  }
  .slide dd {
    height: 100px;
    background: #f1c40f;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  .slide dd div {
    padding: 10px;
  }
  .slide dd:last-of-type {
    border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
  }
</style>
<body>
  <div class="slide s1">
    <dt>daodao</dt>
    <dd>
      <div>houdunren.com</div>
    </dd>
    <dt>daodao</dt>
    <dd>
      <div>hdcms.com</div>
    </dd>
    <dt>daodao</dt>
    <dd>
      <div>hdcms.com</div>
    </dd>
  </div>
</body>

<script>
  class Animation {
    constructor(el) {
      this.el = el;
      this.timeout = 5;
      this.isShow = true;
      this.defaultHeight = this.height;
    }
    hide(callback) {
      this.isShow = false;
      let id = setInterval(() => {
        if (this.height <= 0) {
          clearInterval(id);
          callback && callback();
          return;
        }
        this.height = this.height - 1;
      }, this.timeout);
    }
    show(callback) {
      this.isShow = false;
      let id = setInterval(() => {
        if (this.height >= this.defaultHeight) {
          clearInterval(id);
          callback && callback();
          return;
        }
        this.height = this.height + 1;
      }, this.timeout);
    }
    get height() {
      return window.getComputedStyle(this.el).height.slice(0, -2) * 1;
    }
    set height(height) {
      this.el.style.height = height + "px";
    }
  }
  class Slide {
    constructor(el) {
      this.el = document.querySelector(el);
      this.links = this.el.querySelectorAll("dt");
      this.panels = [...this.el.querySelectorAll("dd")].map(
        item => new Panel(item)
      );
      this.bind();
    }
    bind() {
      this.links.forEach((item, i) => {
        item.addEventListener("click", () => {
          this.action(i);
        });
      });
    }
    action(i) {
      Panel.hideAll(Panel.filter(this.panels, i), () => {
        this.panels[i].show();
      });
    }
  }
  class Panel extends Animation {
    static num = 0;
    static hideAll(items, callback) {
      if (Panel.num > 0) return;
      items.forEach(item => {
        Panel.num++;
        item.hide(() => {
          Panel.num--;
        });
      });
      callback && callback();
    }
    static filter(items, i) {
      return items.filter((item, index) => index != i);
    }
  }
  let hd = new Slide(".s1");
</script>
<style>
  * {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    box-sizing: content-box;
  }
  body {
    padding: 30px;
  }
  .slide {
    width: 300px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); */
  }
  .slide dt {
    height: 30px;
    background: #34495e;
    color: white;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding-left: 10px;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  .slide dt:first-of-type {
    border-top-left-radius: 10px;
    border-top-right-radius: 10px;
  }
  .slide dd {
    height: 100px;
    background: #f1c40f;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  .slide dd div {
    padding: 10px;
  }
  .slide dd:last-of-type {
    border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
  }
</style>

  <div class="slide s1">
    <dt>daodao</dt>

      <div>houdunren.com</div>
    </dd>

  </div>
</body>

<script>
  class Animation {
    constructor(el) {
      this.el = el;
      this.timeout = 5;
      this.isShow = true;
      this.defaultHeight = this.height;
    }
    hide(callback) {
      this.isShow = false;
      let id = setInterval(() => {
        if (this.height <= 0) {
          clearInterval(id);
          callback && callback();
          return;
        }
        this.height = this.height - 1;
      }, this.timeout);
    }
    show(callback) {
      this.isShow = false;
      let id = setInterval(() => {
        if (this.height >= this.defaultHeight) {
          clearInterval(id);
          callback && callback();
          return;
        }
        this.height = this.height + 1;
      }, this.timeout);
    }
    get height() {
      return window.getComputedStyle(this.el).height.slice(0, -2) * 1;
    }
    set height(height) {
      this.el.style.height = height + "px";
    }
  }
  class Slide {
    constructor(el) {
      this.el = document.querySelector(el);
      this.links = this.el.querySelectorAll("dt");
      this.panels = [...this.el.querySelectorAll("dd")].map(
        item => new Panel(item)
      );
      this.bind();
    }
    bind() {
      this.links.forEach((item, i) => {
        item.addEventListener("click", () => {
          this.action(i);
        });
      });
    }
    action(i) {
      Panel.hideAll(Panel.filter(this.panels, i), () => {
        this.panels[i].show();
      });
    }
  }
  class Panel extends Animation {
    static num = 0;
    static hideAll(items, callback) {
      if (Panel.num > 0) return;
      items.forEach(item => {
        Panel.num++;
        item.hide(() => {
          Panel.num--;
        });
      });
      callback && callback();
    }
    static filter(items, i) {
      return items.filter((item, index) => index != i);
    }
  }
  let hd = new Slide(".s1");
</script>
